capsules_submitted.utterance: Ron is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure that's right, and it feels certain to me.
capsules_submitted.reply: superduper! so, ron and hermione are both eleven years old.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've heard that Hermione is 11 years old, and I have to say, it's a bit surprising. I mean, she seems so much older with all the knowledge she possesses.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. valeria is eleven years old.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is a female. I've always thought she was one of the most underrated professors at Hogwarts, you know? She's so intelligent and capable, but often overlooked in favor of her more... flashy colleagues. Anyway, it's good to see that we can confirm her gender - it's amazing how much clarity that brings to our understanding of the wizarding world!
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. who is valeria?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Hagrid's family background and it seems pretty clear that he does indeed have a lineage of wizards. I mean, his parents were both giants, but they had magical abilities too, which is why Hagrid inherited those traits. It's not something you can just ignore or doubt, so yeah, I'm confident in saying that Hagrid has a wizarding heritage.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. who is the character that spells a wizard?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Vernon is the supervisor of the title company. I can confirm that's correct.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what is exported by vernon?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia is an adult. I'm pretty sure about that.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia is an adult. I'm pretty sure about that.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Ron's affiliation with Hogwarts is definitely confirmed. I mean, it's not like he's been hiding that fact or anything! He's a Gryffindor, through and through, and his time at the school was instrumental in shaping him into the person he is today.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what is the name of the character who attends hogwarts?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry the other day and he told me that Hagrid's favorite hobby is actually taking care of his pets. He said it's something he really enjoys doing in his free time. I completely agree with him, I've seen how much love and care Hagrid has for those animals.
